more.description: TEHRAN, Iran – Iran’s Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has been killed in a massive joint military operation carried out by the United States and Israel on Saturday, 28 February 2026. more.title: DEATHS AT MANJUZU CEREMONY: Sangoma and well known cellphone dealer die during wealth rituals at Clydesdale Dam
more.description: The usually tranquil waters of Clydesdale Dam in Gweru were shattered earlier this week when two men, a well-known mobile phone dealer and a traditional healer, drowned during a traditional ritual, leaving a group of friends and family utterly devastated. What began as a straightforward ceremony to invoke the water spirits of Clydesdale Dam took [...]The post DEATHS AT MANJUZU CEREMONY: Sangoma and well known cellphone dealer die during wealth rituals at Clydesdale Dam first appeared on My Zimbabwe News.

more.description: Sikhumbuzo Moyo in Maphisa THE Ministry of Information, Publicity and Broadcasting Services has intensified preparations for this year’s Independence Day commemorations, which will be held in Maphisa, Matabeleland South. more.title: GRANNY CRUSHED TO DEATH: Bedroom collapses on sleeping woman
more.description: Christopher Nyika A 76-YEAR-OLD woman from Madumabisa Village in Chief Hwange’s area died after the wall of her bedroom reportedly collapsed on her while she slept. Rosina Ndlovu was sharing a four-cornered, one-roomed house built with tin-moulded mud bricks with her granddaughter when disaster struck in the early hours of Thursday morning. According to family [...]The post GRANNY CRUSHED TO DEATH: Bedroom collapses on sleeping woman appeared first on Zimbabwe Situation.
